Trade/Device Name(s): VITEK Gram Positive Susceptibility (GPS) Card for Daptomycin
Regulation Name(s): Fully Automated Short-Term Incubation Cycle Antimicrobial Susceptibility Devices
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for VITEK Gram Positive Daptomycin antimicrobial susceptibility test card for use with VITEK System
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative antimicrobial susceptibility testing of Enterococcus faecalis, Staphylococcus aureus, Streptococcus agalactiae, Staphylococcus epidermidis, and Staphylococcus haemolyticus as a laboratory aid in determining in vitro susceptibility to antimicrobial agents using the VITEK System
